title: Bind SkPixelSerializer
body:
`SkPixelSerializer` can be used to custom-encode images:
https://github.com/google/skia/blob/master/include/core/SkPixelSerializer.h

https://fiddle.skia.org/c/@SkImage_to_PPM_binary
https://fiddle.skia.org/c/@SkImage_to_PPM_ascii

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: This has been added to the update-m60 branch already, and will be merged soon.
